pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
CESSNA 414AW CHANCELLOR OUTSIDE AIR TEMPERATURE GAUGE
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION "EXTERMINATE THE MICE FROM YOUR COCKPIT!" GitHub: https://simstrumentation.com
OAT gauge for the Cessna 414AWChancellor by FlySimware
NOTES: - Designed to match the appearance of the C414AW - Front bezel glass and internal reflection can be disabled in the user properties - Should work on other MSFS aircraft but compatibility not guaranteed
